content: unisex neck sock by wendy c brown materials 430 yd sport weight yarn g hook yarn needle gauge 22 row of 18 single_crochet worked in back loops only = 4 x4 finished dimensions 15 x5 note entire pattern is worked in back loops only chain 25 row 1 - single_crochet in top loop of 2nd chain from hook and in each rem chain to end row 2 - chain 1 single_crochet in same st and in each single_crochet to end 24 st row 3 - 73 - repeat row 2 leaving long tail at end of last row for joining using yarn needle join ends together using whipstitch weave in ends copyright 2008 wendy c brown all rights reserved reproducing or transmitting this pattern by any means for any purpose other than personal use constitutes a violation of copyright law finished product not to be used for resale or profit personal or charitable use only
